title: Screen actors
creator_contributor_role: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture industry - United States
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture industry
description: Motion Picture actors are seen in their homes, conducting important business of their craft through Screen Actors Guild and meeting the problems of everyday living the same as other citizens. The film is concerned mainly with presenting film actors as ordinary people. Reginald Denny is an aeronautical engineer; Esther Williams a successful business woman; Clark Gable as a keen rancher; Lionel Barrymore a talented artist.
